body:
I am out of the office unexpectedly due to a family emergency. Tentatively
returning Tuesday, the 27th of March.

If you need immediate assistance, please call my mobile at 702.788.8886 and
I will return your call within a 24 hour period.


Thank you for your patience,
Janelle
subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance-general Digest, Vol 97, Issue 17
